datafield.subfield: Book of hours (Ms. Pierpont Morgan Library. M.198)
Heading represents the textual contents of ms.; for ms. as a physical entity, including its decoration, use: Pierpont Morgan Library. Manuscript. M.198.
Census of Medieval and Renaissance manuscripts in the United States and Canada, 1961:
v. 2, p. 1403 (198; Horae; written in northern France in the 15th century) p. 1359 (Pierpont Morgan Library, New York)
(Pierpont Morgan Library. Manuscript. M.198; Ms. book of hours for the use of Amiens (Hours of the Virgin) and Rome (Office of the Dead); written and illuminated in France, probably Amiens, ca. 1480)
